title.rendered: 2019 Brand New Conference: Open Call for 15-Minute Speakers

content.rendered:
As part of an effort to do some good with the Brand New Conference — full details to be shared when we announce speakers in early to mid-May — we are looking for 4 speakers that meet the following criteria:

  • Have designed AND implemented an identity project — new or redesign — for a charity, nonprofit, or NGO between 2017 and 2019.
  • The project was done 100% pro-bono.
  • You are based in the U.S. — this is for budget reasons; if you are willing to cover the bulk of your flight ticket from outside the U.S. you are welcome to apply.

During the conference we will devote, each day, one of the 45-minute sessions to this kind of project/engagement. The selected designers will have 15 minutes each to present the case study for their client (in-house designers can apply too!).

UnderConsideration will cover travel and accommodations and you will be one of the twenty speakers presenting.

Deadline: Monday, March 25.

To apply:

  • By e-mail only to armin@underconsideration.com
  • Subject: 2019 BNConf 15-Minute Proposal
  • Include client name and year designed/implemented
  • Link to, or PDF of, case study
  • Name, bio, and location of who would be speaking (if submitting on behalf of a firm)

Only selected designers will be contacted. We will be as rigorous in this selection as with the rest of the speaker line-up. Our main criteria is relevance and quality of the work.
